EmailTemplate.name: 6_25_2014 VMUG Minn Pre-Event mailer.Email_NEW
EmailTemplate.subject: Going to Minneapolis VMUG {{lead.first name:default=}}? | We're On Your Passport.
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Minneapolis VMWare Users Summit <http://vmturbo.com/events/minneapolis-vmware-users-summit-june-5th-2014-2?utm_source=vmturbo&utm_medium=email&utm_campaign=vmugpre> June 26, 2014 | Doubletree by Hilton Green Shirts | Remarkably Good-Looking | Booth #13 VMTurbo representatives will be at Booth #13 to discuss virtualization management and the features of our latest release, VMTurbo Operations Manager 4.6, including:
- Control modules for EMC VNX, NetApp, and Cisco UCS that allow you to manage and control both fabric and storage - Cluster Flattening - distributing loads across all hosts in your environment by eliminating artificial cluster boundaries - allowing for even greater utilization and densities while assuring VM performance - Customizable dashboards and reports - Intelligent, truly-automated stack control for your SDDC
In addition to leading the virtual revolution, VMTurbo has been busy collecting hardware (Awards, not blades):
- #26 Forbes America's Most Promising Companies 2014 - TechTrailblazers Who To Watch in 2014 First Place in Virtualization - Storage Magazine's Product of the Year 2013 Bronze Level in Storage Management Tools
See you in Minneapolis. Register Now <http://www.vmug.com/p/cm/ld/fid=5127> 500 Boylston Street, Eighth Floor, Boston, MA 02116 Tel: 866.634.5087
